metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3699 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The Linux kernel, as used in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.2 and Red HatEnterprise MRG 2 and when booted with UEFI Secure Boot enabled, allowslocal users to bypass intended Secure Boot restrictions and executeuntrusted code by appending ACPI tables to the initrd.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
linux-grouper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
